mapper.select: select id as templateId, name as templateName , user_id as userId , sections ,durations , created_at as createdAt , updated_at as updatedAt , internal_sections as internalSections , orders as orders from templates where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into templates (name,user_id,sections , durations ,internal_sections,orders, created_at) values (#{templateName},#{userId},#{sections},#{durations},#{internalSections},#{orders},NOW())
mapper.update: Update templates set name=#{templateName} , sections=#{sections},durations = #{durations},internal_sections=#{internalSections},orders=#{orders} , updated_at=NOW() where id=#{templateId}
